testimonials.testimonialText: I needed electricity turned on THE SAME DAY for my new apartment. Called at 10am, had power by 3pm. Absolutely saved me - I was moving in that afternoon and needed AC working in the Texas heat. ComparePower came through!

My move-in got pushed up last minute. I needed power in 24 hours and thought I was out of luck. ComparePower's same-day service option was a lifesaver - had electricity the next morning. Can't thank them enough!

Emergency relocation for work - had to move across the state with 2 days notice. ComparePower expedited everything and I had power on day one in my new place. Made a stressful situation so much easier.
Signed my lease on Friday, moving in Monday. Needed electricity fast! ComparePower's rush service got me set up over the weekend - had power waiting when I arrived Monday morning. Perfect!
Lease started unexpectedly early and I was moving furniture in that day. Called ComparePower in the morning, electricity was on by early afternoon. Same-day service is no joke - they really deliver!
